name: VZ-58 magazine
description: A standard 30-round magazine made for the VZ-58 rifle, made of stamped sheet metal.

name: polymer VZ-58 magazine
description: A standard 30-round magazine made for the VZ-58 rifle, made of molded polymer. It's half the weight of a standard magazine.

name: STG-44 Magazine
description: A magazine for an STG-44 rifle chambered in 7.92x33 kurtz. The date stamp on this magazine indicates it's a brand new magazine.
